SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.model.GameModel
public class GameModel extends Object
The GameModel class represents the core logic of the game, managing game state, player actions, and interactions within the game environment. It follows the singleton pattern to ensure only one instance is used throughout the game.
Author:
Changyu Li
